name: Frozen Skies
description:
You are stuck in a frozen wasteland in the sky. You must find a way to survive the cold with the weight of an entire empire resting on your shoulders.

The game was created for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam.

Theme: Keep it Alive.

The game was made by:

Programmer: ThorGameDev

Artists: Jonrei and Anchry
